mapper.select: SELECT F.GUID, F.CLASSGUID, F.TABLENAME, F.FIELDNAME, F.COLUMNNAME, F.ISBUILTIN, F.DESCRIPTION, F.TYPEVALUE, F.VALIDITYREGEX, F.FIELDSIZE, F.FIELDDEFAULT, F.MANDATORY, F.FIELDTYPE, F.INHERITED, F.CODEREFFIELD, F.ISROLLBACK, F.TITLE, F.ISSYSTEM, F.TABLEINDEX, F.CREATETIME, F.CREATEUSERGUID, F.UPDATETIME, F.UPDATEUSERGUID, (SELECT M.CLASSNAME FROM MA_CLASS M WHERE M.GUID = F.CLASSGUID) CLASSNAME, (SELECT M.SUPERINTERFACE FROM MA_CLASS M WHERE M.GUID = F.CLASSGUID) SUPERINTERFACE FROM MA_FIELD F ORDER BY F.FIELDNAME

SELECT F.GUID, F.CLASSGUID, F.TABLENAME, F.FIELDNAME, F.COLUMNNAME, F.ISBUILTIN, F.DESCRIPTION, F.TYPEVALUE, F.VALIDITYREGEX, F.FIELDSIZE F.FIELDDEFAULT, F.MANDATORY, F.FIELDTYPE, F.INHERITED, F.CODEREFFIELD, F.ISROLLBACK, F.TITLE, F.ISSYSTEM, F.TABLEINDEX, F.CREATETIME, F.CREATEUSERGUID, F.UPDATETIME, F.UPDATEUSERGUID, (SELECT M.CLASSNAME FROM MA_CLASS M WHERE M.GUID = F.CLASSGUID) CLASSNAME, (SELECT M.SUPERINTERFACE FROM MA_CLASS M WHERE M.GUID = F.CLASSGUID) SUPERINTERFACE FROM MA_FIELD F WHERE F.GUID=#GUID#

SELECT F.GUID, F.CLASSGUID, F.TABLENAME, F.FIELDNAME, F.COLUMNNAME, F.ISBUILTIN, F.DESCRIPTION, F.TYPEVALUE, F.VALIDITYREGEX, F.FIELDSIZE, F.FIELDDEFAULT, F.MANDATORY, F.FIELDTYPE, F.INHERITED, F.CODEREFFIELD, F.ISROLLBACK, F.TITLE, F.ISSYSTEM, F.TABLEINDEX, F.CREATETIME, F.CREATEUSERGUID, F.UPDATETIME, F.UPDATEUSERGUID, (SELECT M.CLASSNAME FROM MA_CLASS M WHERE M.GUID = F.CLASSGUID) CLASSNAME, (SELECT M.SUPERINTERFACE FROM MA_CLASS M WHERE M.GUID = F.CLASSGUID) SUPERINTERFACE FROM MA_FIELD F
and GUID=#GUID# and CLASSGUID=#CLASSGUID# and FIELDNAME=#FIELDNAME# and COLUMNNAME=#COLUMNNAME# and ISBUILTIN=#ISBUILTIN# and DESCRIPTION=#DESCRIPTION# and TYPEVALUE=#TYPEVALUE# and VALIDITYREGEX=#VALIDITYREGEX# and FIELDSIZE=#FIELDSIZE# and FIELDDEFAULT=#FIELDDEFAULT# and MANDATORY=#MANDATORY# and FIELDTYPE=#FIELDTYPE# and INHERITED=#INHERITED# and CODEREFFIELD=#CODEREFFIELD# and ISROLLBACK=#ISROLLBACK# and TITLE=#TITLE# and ISSYSTEM=#ISSYSTEM# and TABLEINDEX=#TABLEINDEX#
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MA_FIELD(GUID, CLASSGUID, TABLENAME, FIELDNAME, COLUMNNAME, ISBUILTIN, DESCRIPTION, TYPEVALUE, VALIDITYREGEX, FIELDSIZE, FIELDDEFAULT, MANDATORY, FIELDTYPE, INHERITED, CODEREFFIELD, ISROLLBACK, TITLE, ISSYSTEM, TABLEINDEX, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID ) VALUES(#GUID#, #CLASSGUID:VARCHAR#, #TABLENAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #COLUMNNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISBUILTIN:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TYPEVALUE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #VALIDITYREGEX:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDSIZE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDDEFAULT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MANDATORY:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #INHERITED:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CODEREFFIELD:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISROLLBACK:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TITLE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISSYSTEM:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TABLEINDEX:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MA_FIELD
UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, COLUMNNAME=#COLUMNNAME#, ISBUILTIN=#ISBUILTIN#, DESCRIPTION=#DESCRIPTION#, TYPEVALUE=#TYPEVALUE#, VALIDITYREGEX=#VALIDITYREGEX#, FIELDSIZE=#FIELDSIZE#, FIELDDEFAULT=#FIELDDEFAULT#, MANDATORY=#MANDATORY#, FIELDTYPE=#FIELDTYPE#, INHERITED=#INHERITED#, CODEREFFIELD=#CODEREFFIELD#, ISROLLBACK=#ISROLLBACK#, TITLE=#TITLE#, ISSYSTEM=#ISSYSTEM#, TABLEINDEX=#TABLEINDEX#,
WHERE GUID = #GUID#
UPDATE MA_FIELD SET TABLEINDEX = #TABLEINDEX# WHERE CLASSGUID IN (SELECT M.GUID FROM MA_CLASS M WHERE UPPER(M.REALBASETABLENAME) = #REABBASETABLENAME# ) AND UPPER(COLUMNNAME) = UPPER(#COLUMNNAME#)
UPDATE MA_FIELD SET TABLEINDEX = NULL, COLUMNNAME = NULL WHERE CLASSGUID = #CLASSGUID# AND FIELDNAME = #FIELDNAME#
